Package farm

Class LegendaryFarmer

java.lang.Object
farm.Player
farm.Farmer
farm.RegisteredFarmer
farm.DistinguishedFarmer
farm.LegendaryFarmer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Upgradeable
public class LegendaryFarmer extends DistinguishedFarmer
This class is the highest level in the Farmer Series.

The bonusFert variable is introduced here.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    protected int
    bonusFert
    This is the amount that the water limit of a crop in the harvest calculations can be increased by.

  • Field Details

    • bonusFert

      protected int bonusFert

  • Constructor Details

    • LegendaryFarmer

      protected LegendaryFarmer(DistinguishedFarmer player)
      This constructor creates a LegendaryFarmer object derived from a DistinguishedFarmer object.

      This constructor deducts the player's object coins after calling super(). All the values of protected variables starting from RegisteredFarmer are changed here.

      Parameters:
      player - DistinguishedFarmer object to be turned into this class.
